title: 请高手看看。
author: erxat911
txt_content:
我的服务器是在  windows2008 R2 64位 系统下建立的 一开就提示Error occurred during initialization of VMCould not reserve enough space for object heap
请按任意键继续. . .怎么办？

replies.author: ★_幽灵丶
replies.txt_content:
蹦服了
修改内存
你的系统资源不够
换个电脑吧

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content: 打开你的开服文件，修改内存

replies.author: 小钧
replies.txt_content: 修改一下内存看看。可以加Q1240871094

replies.author: erxat911
replies.txt_content: 把Xmx1 -Xms1 换了就好了   不过多谢
